page.title: 19 LOCAL NEWS - CALNE
page.content: In the centre of Calne there was a huge factory called "Harrises".They made pork pies and sausages and things like that.One day they decided to stop people working there and to demolish it.Whatever the reason was I still disagree because it employed lots of people and they had to find another job and some did not succeed.Then the time came to knock it down. I suppose it is a good idea because it took up so much room. Knocking it down is dangerous, there is a lot of rubble and dust. Large trucks take the rubble away.One day a large bit fell on the main road and the crane had to come and clear it.It only just missed a car.What is going to take its place?The Council have asked the people of Calne for help and have made a competition to design the area that will be cleared.
